english.title: TT/CU checker configuration
english.changed_language_message: The TT/CU checker display language has been changed to:
english.deleted_history_message: TT/CU checker testing history is now deleted from the device and is not recoverable!
english.no_connection: The serial port (COM port) can't connect to the configuration app!
english.incorrect_com: Invalid serial (COM) port format. Try again!

latvian.title: TT/CU checker konfigurācija
latvian.changed_language_message: TT/CU checker displeja valoda ir pārmainīta uz:
latvian.deleted_history_message: TT/CU checker pārbaudes vēsture tiek izdzēsta no ierīces un nav atgriežama!
latvian.no_connection: Seriālais ports (COM port) nespēj savienoties ar konfigurācijas aplikāciju!
latvian.incorrect_com: Nederīgs seriālais (COM) porta formāts. Mēģini vēlreiz!
